posts.title: Post1
posts.body: I just wanted to let you know that I've now added a new chapter near the end of the course all about using Vue 3 with Firebase 9. Version 9 of Firebase adopts a more modular & functional approach, which takes advantage of something called 'tree-shaking'. This means that any unused Firebase code is ' shaken' out of our final production bundles, leading to a better performance.
